mapper.insert: insert into reply(member_id, product_idx,content, content_date) values (#{member_id}, #{product_idx},#{content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from reply order by reply_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply2(member_id, reply_idx,content2, content2_date,product_idx) values (#{member_id}, #{reply_idx},#{content2}, now(),#{product_idx})
mapper.select: select m.*, r.* from reply as r inner join members as m on r.member_id=m.member_id where r.product_idx=#{product_idx} order by reply_idx desc
select m.*, r2.* from reply2 as r2 inner join members as m on r2.member_id=m.member_id
